meanings.sent1: The teacher readmits the student after lunch.
meanings.sent2: The security guard readmits visitors after they show their IDs.
meanings.sent3: The door readmits anyone who forgot their keys.
meanings.sent4: The library readmits silence after the noisy group leaves.
meanings.sent5: The key readmits access to the locked room.

meanings.sent1: The hospital readmits patients for follow-up appointments.
meanings.sent2: The airline readmits passengers who missed their flight.
meanings.sent3: The club readmits members who pay their dues on time.
meanings.sent4: The school readmits students who were previously expelled.
meanings.sent5: The park readmits visitors after a brief closure.
